titleInfo.title: Legajo 1, Expte. 9. Expediente promovido por el moreno Julian Escalera y el Pardo Francisco Fernández, 1867-1868

name.namePart: National Endowment for the Humanities Collaborative Research Grant

mods.abstract: "Expediente promovido por el moreno Julian Escalera y el Pardo Francisco Fernández solicitando erigir una Cofradía bajo la advocación de San Francisco de Assis en la Iglesia de Termino del Santo Cristo del Buen Viaje." 1867.
mods.note: Vanderbilt University makes these historical records available for the limited purposes of individual private study, scholarship, research, teaching, and other educational or instructional uses. No rights of any kind are granted to users with respect to photographs or graphic images published on this site.

subject.geographic: Iglesia del Santo Cristo del Buen Viaje,Havana,La Habana,Cuba
